entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 15.

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning. Snow beginning near noon. Risk of freezing drizzle late in the afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023
